attributes.action: Award the People of the Falkland Islands for their support of the Armed Services during the Falklands Conflict
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As well as commemorating the Islanders for their unstinting support of the Task Force in 1982, make an award similar to that of Malta, to the Falkland Islands. Although much more information is coming to the surface about what the Islanders did during the Occupation, little has been done to actually award the Islands in a suitable manner. 
Falkland Islanders really did suffer under occupation through their treatment at the hands of the invaders and they were constantly under threat of death. Consequently many did carry out acts which could have resulted in their being killed.
It is time something similar to the George Cross were awarded to the Islands.
